features: Simple to use: Use the simple interface of your smartphone via our free elemnt companion app to customize settings, configure workout pages and link sensors
Store your ride history and automatically sync workouts to your favorite training apps
Simple to see: Perfect view zoom allows you to zoom in and out of data fields that are most important to you

Simple to track: Set up your rival and elemnt bike computer to automatically share data between devices during a triathlon with multisport handover so that you can view your race on both devices – a seamless performance advantage, this really sets this product apart from any competition
Touchless transition automatically transitions the elemnt rival between legs of a triathlon so that you can maintain focus on your race, rather than your equipment
Designed to perform: The elemnt rival is built to perform, with a high contrast color screen, easy to see in any environment
The focus is on the athlete, and trying to make the next workout, or race, a simple and pain free experience
Kickr control: Pairs with kickr smart trainers to allow you to train in three different modes: erg, level or passive to just record your workout controlled by another app
Feature rich multisport swim, bike and run data tracking via internal rival sensors: optical heart rate, barometric altimeter, accelerometer, gps.
